diagrams.title: Model Deployment
diagrams.description: Export Model → ONNX/TensorRT → Container → Load Balancer → Serve → Monitor

diagrams.title: Feature Store
diagrams.description: Raw Data → Feature Engineering → Store → Serve (Train/Inference) → Version Control

diagrams.title: Model Monitoring
diagrams.description: Production Model → Log Predictions → Detect Drift → Alert → Retrain Trigger

diagrams.title: Continuous Training
diagrams.description: New Data → Trigger → Retrain → Validate → Deploy → Monitor → Loop
